pizzas.title: Mario Special
pizzas.description: An extra cheesy pizza on a thin and crispy base, loaded with olives and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Luigi Special
pizzas.description: Peppers and mushrooms on a Luigi-special garlic base, with BBQ sauce instead of the usual tomato.

pizzas.title: Peach's Hawaiian
pizzas.description: A fruity combination of pineapple, sweetcorn, and mushrooms on a light, thin base.

pizzas.title: Toad's Veggie Delight
pizzas.description: A mix of fresh vegetables including tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, and olives on a whole wheat base.

pizzas.title: Yoshi's Meatless Feast
pizzas.description: A hearty pizza topped with mushrooms, peppers, and olives, perfect for veggie lovers.

pizzas.title: Bowser's Inferno
pizzas.description: A spicy pizza with peppers and olives on a fiery base.

pizzas.title: Daisy's Garden Fresh
pizzas.description: A light and refreshing pizza with sweetcorn, olives, and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Wario's BBQ Delight
pizzas.description: BBQ sauce with sweetcorn, mushrooms, and peppers on a crispy crust.

pizzas.title: Koopa's Veggie Feast
pizzas.description: A veggie lover's dream with sweetcorn, olives, and mushrooms on a garlic butter base.

pizzas.title: Rosalina's Cosmic Veggie
pizzas.description: A cosmic blend of sweetcorn, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives on a pesto base.

pizzas.title: Donkey Kong's Tropical
pizzas.description: A tropical blend with pineapple, mushrooms, and olives.

pizzas.title: Toadette's Special
pizzas.description: A special mix of mushrooms, peppers, and olives on a thin base.

pizzas.title: King Boo's Ghostly Pizza
pizzas.description: A spooky blend of olives and mushrooms on a ghostly white sauce base.

pizzas.title: Waluigi's Wicked Veggie
pizzas.description: A wicked mix of peppers, sweetcorn, and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Birdo's Sweet Surprise
pizzas.description: A sweet surprise of sweetcorn and pineapple on a thin crust.

pizzas.title: Shy Guy's Secret Pizza
pizzas.description: A secret blend of mushrooms and olives with a special sauce.

pizzas.title: Kamek's Magical Veggie
pizzas.description: A magical mix of mushrooms, olives, and peppers on a crispy crust.

pizzas.title: Bowser Jr.'s Fiery Pizza
pizzas.description: A fiery blend of peppers and olives on a spicy base.

pizzas.title: Captain Toad's Treasure
pizzas.description: A treasure of mushrooms, olives, and sweetcorn on a garlic butter base.

pizzas.title: Pauline's Classic Veggie
pizzas.description: A classic mix of mushrooms, peppers, and olives on a tomato base.

pizzas.title: Bowser Special
pizzas.description: A firey pizza with mushrooms on peppers

pizzas.title: Pellini Special
pizzas.description: A fiesty pizza with peppers and olives

pizzas.title: Cosmeco Special Treat
pizzas.description: A treat with sweetcorn, olives and pineapple
